title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 23, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss reacts to bad news from home, relates the latest actions of the armies, and reports to his wife what he has recently sent her.
keywords: Home Front, Women, Family, Troop Movement, Battle Description, Military Authority, Death/Casualties, Prions/Prisoners, American Civil War
